text: @Alyssa_Milano Have you not seen all the videos Bernie Sanders has made with doctors discussing the coronavirus in depth? You are an absolute enemy to working class people for sharing this obvious smear, and an absolute enemy to the #metoo movement for supporting accused rapist Joe Biden.
